Who is the author of the classic children's novel 'Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret'
Judy Blume
Which British newspaper profiled Judy Blume?
The Sunday Times
Who wrote the profile about Judy Blume?
Hadley Freeman
What was the headline of the profile?
Judy Blume: 'I'm behind JK Rowling 100 per cent'
What did Blume say about JK Rowling?
I love her. I am behind her 100 per cent as I watch from afar.
What issue was Freeman referring to when she said Blume was supporting Rowling?
Women's sex-based rights
What did Blume tweet to clarify her stance?
She stands with the transgender community
What interview did Blume point to in her subsequent tweet?
An interview with Variety
Which memoir did Blume praise in the Variety interview?
Maia Kobabe's memoir Gender Queer
Who did Freeman interview last year for the Guardian?
Margaret Atwood
